Status.Name: wormsHalf
Status.Description: Gained from choosing 'Who Cares?' at the worms sign. Halves the chance that worms will be encountered.

Status.Name: wormsOff
Status.Description: Gained from choosing 'Grossed Out' at the worms sign. Worms are turned off and will not appear in the game.

Status.Name: wormsOn
Status.Description: Gained from choosing 'Aroused' or 'Who Cares?' at the worms sign. Worms are turned on and will appear in the game.
